events.title: Chemistry Workshop: Exploring Organic Compounds
events.description: Join us for an interactive workshop where we'll delve into the world of organic chemistry with hands-on experiments.
details: Explore real-world applications of organic chemistry
Suitable for beginners and intermediate learners

events.title: Guest Lecture: Innovations in Chemical Engineering
events.description: A special lecture by Dr. Alan Brown discussing the latest advancements in chemical engineering and their real-world applications.
details: Presentation by renowned chemical engineer Dr. Alan Brown
